evidence.evidenceDesc: It's said that all life came from the Priomordial Soup, a massive body of soup from which lifeforms emerged.NEWLINENEWLINEBy definition and title, this Priomordial Soup was... well, a soup.

The ocean has much miscellaneous flora, and tons upon tons of plant life with a high variety of types and purposes.NEWLINENEWLINEWithout proper nutrients in the sea, these wouldn't be able to grow. But they do, and lay the foundation for many herbivores.

exposition: STARTGREY    Warm greetings, and thank you for playing with this software.NEWLINE    This tutorial disc will teach you the basics of playing a disc, as well as some common practice for making discs of your own.NEWLINENEWLINE    This tutorial will go over explanations of the different types of phases, as well as brief examples of those phases. Hopefully this will help you gain a feel for how the game is played.ENDCOLOR

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: The first phase type we will go over is Discussion.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: This current phase is a Discussion, so you may have already gotten an idea on how it works.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Characters speak to each other and, well, discuss, automatically.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: These discussions are usually important to the story (where applicable) and to the debate; be sure to listen closely!

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: In addition, sometimes STARTGOLDcolored textENDCOLOR will appear in the discussion.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: There are a limited number of colors that can appear in Discussion, not all colors this software can produce is used here.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: STARTGOLDGold textENDCOLOR will generally highlight an important word or phrase.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: It is also worth note that you possess an STARTGOLDInfluence gaugeENDCOLOR. It is a measure of how trustworthy you seem to everyone else.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: This guage decreases when you give an incorrect answer during a Choice phase or use the wrong evidence/target the wrong statement in any debate phase.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: If this guage reaches zero, your peers become too suspiscious of you, and you are unable to continue.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: When this happens, STARTGOLDthe playback will restart from the beginningENDCOLOR and you will have to replay up to that point.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: However, it is also possible to STARTGOLDheal your Influence gaugeENDCOLOR. This will be detailed more later.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: The next phase will come up shortly. It will be a Choice phase.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: In a Choice phase, there is no conversation. You are merely given a prompt and a list of answers.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: You must simply pick the option you believe best answers the prompt.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Choices are less of an entire phase and more of a small thing to keep Discussions lively.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: However, they have the potential to make or break a playback.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Choices deal more damage to your Influence gauge when you choose incorrectly, but also heal a full block when you choose well.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: You will now be given a Choice phase.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Throughout this tutorial, we will use the topic of whether or not the ocean is a soup as a placeholder.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: It's often a good idea to glance over your evidence at the beginning of a playback.

lines.speaker: Tutorial
lines.speech: Keep in mind that you can do so at any time during a Discussion!
